{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.680
    | text      = Hey, it's Tucker Carlson.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:25.759
    | text      = Belmont Hill is a small private school outside of Boston.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:42.640
    | text      = of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:43.640
    | text      = Yeah, I'm really enjoying this part so far.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:45.400
    | text      = So the Belmont Hill school has a bunch of really strong sports teams.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:50.240
    | text      = They compete in the independent school league, and their baseball team has the record for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:54.000
    | text      = most league titles with 16.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:56.539
    | text      = Their golf team has also won 16 ISL titles in the time just since 1989, and they won
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.759
    | text      = the title in 2022, just before when you would have any awareness of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.480
    | text      = They went undefeated the entire season, their golf team.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:12.759
    | text      = Their crew team has won the New England Rowing Association Championship 14 times, and this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.519
    | text      = kind of statistic goes on into their hockey, lacrosse, tennis, and wrestling teams as well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:22.440
    | text      = Tucker is trying to take a cheap shot at this school, but he didn't look into it at all.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:26.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:29.880
    | text      = a speech that the school's founder gave in 1924, where he explained that choice for the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:34.759
    | text      = school's mascot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.759
    | text      = Fucking love sextants, bro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:37.519
    | text      = Well, I mean, I mean, just first of all, this is up in Boston, and so there's a bit of a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:41.799
    | text      = nautical kind of vibe to New England, so that's appropriate there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.279
    | text      = And then, quote, to be appropriate, the device would have to symbolize some fine ideal in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:51.720
    | text      = education.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:52.720
    | text      = It would have to express, in one way or another, the spirit that we wish to propagate, namely,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.720
    | text      = that of service through scholarship.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:59.720
    | text      = And so, in the course of many weeks, quite a number of emblems were suggested.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:03.559
    | text      = Curiously enough, perhaps because several of us love the sea and everything connected
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:07.640
    | text      = with it, nautical devices seem to be the favorites.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:10.660
    | text      = Some of these, like the compass and the capstan, were apparently suitable, but one by one,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:16.160
    | text      = either through too great intricacy or because of lack of originality, they were rejected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:21.160
